content:
re :I get a "Mozilla Thunderbird not responding" message

The most common cause of that message is because something has intervened and the most common culprit is the Anti-Virus. So you need to rule that out by stopping it from scanning any opened file in your profile.

Exit Thunderbird. Check it really is not running via the 'Task Manager'

Access your Anti-Virus product, set up an exemption to not scan the Thunderbird profile folder.

Assuming you have installed Thunderbird from the official website: https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/all/

You need to make the following 'Thunderbird' folder exempt from scanning C://Users/usrename/Appdata/Roaming/Thunderbird
